ygData.subject: Lake Rathetea
ygData.msgSnippet: I have a question for you all. Where the hell Aviaks In Lake Rathe. Also I have saved up 37 skill points for resurch. I was told by someone that when they got
ygData.messageBody:
I have a question for you all. Where the hell Aviaks In Lake Rathe.

Also I have saved up 37 skill points for resurch. I was told by someone that
when they got to level 16 they could only train once in that skill. Ok dont
make me cry. Let me down softly. Is it true?

One last question. I need to find out if this is rumor or true. S O W
rings(spirit of the wolf) do they realy exsist. Or is this just another
rumor to make us lower levels drool. If any one knows anything on this I
would like info. Being a necro with out doge to level 22, when a pet dies
god you got be able to run. I hate it when your pet dies for a stupied
resason and a blue uper hand kills you. Grrrr!!
